messages.subject: Re: Shirts
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks!  It s gone now :-( but tell her Happy Birthday for me from a fellow 12/21er.  It was such a cool day because it was the last weekend day before
messages.messageBody:
Thanks! It's gone now :-( but tell her Happy Birthday for me from a
fellow 12/21er. It was such a cool day because it was the last
weekend day before Christmas and we had all kinds of people stopping
by to drop off presents and goodies and we had our own visiting to do
too.

Holly

messages.subject: Re: Shirts
messages.msgSnippet: I m still here.  It s my birthday and I decided to stick around for another day.  Could somebody post something controversial and make it a little more
messages.messageBody:
I'm still here. It's my birthday and I decided to stick around for
another day. Could somebody post something controversial and make it
a little more interesting? <beg>

I understand about kids and white shirts. The technology just isn't
there for cafepress to do a quality print on color shirts but they're
working on it so check back from time to time. The shirts are 100%
cotton so they can be bleached.

Susan, I love your shirts! If I get enough cafecash, I'm buying the
Plato one. :-)

Holly

messages.subject: Shirts
messages.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately, Cafepress has shirts only in white and ash grey.  I hope they change that soon.  I have my own page - www.cafepress.com/homeschoolkids - and
messages.messageBody:
>>Holly,

>>I like some of the shirts, but can you get them in any colors? White
>>doesn't work well with my sons. : )


Unfortunately, Cafepress has shirts only in white and ash grey. I hope they
change that soon. I have my own page - www.cafepress.com/homeschoolkids - and
I will be thrilled when I can do some shirts in dark grey and black.

Susan
